details.script_description: This script runs an IceTray simulation using the 'step_0_inject_veto_muons.py' script. It uses a YAML configuration file ('veto_muons__NuGen_21217.yaml') to define the simulation parameters and injects veto muons into the simulation. The script also handles output file management and temporary scratch space usage. The final output file is saved to '/data/user/vbasu/simulation_scripts/00000-00999/Level0.0_nugen_IC86.2012_pass2.022010.000000.i3.bz2'.
